creditline: Gift of Mrs. C. C. Bovey
description: plate, porcelain, blue on white, river scene with boat and three figures in center, beyond, on shore, a domed and minareted building with ruined wall at right, to left, a spreading tree projects over the water, rim shallowly indented in eight sections, border composed of single rose sprays on a ground of deeper blue lattice pattern, three flaws in surface
title: Plate
